title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, November 24, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Arundhati Roy (1959), who wrote "The God of Small Things" (1997) all at once, no drafts, and it won the Man Booker Prize.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Arundhati Roy (1959), who wrote "The God of Small Things" (1997) all at once, no drafts, and it won the Man Booker Prize.
